name: Homer Simpson
quotes: “Kids, just because I don’t care doesn’t mean I’m not listening.”
“To alcohol! The cause of, and solution to, all of life's problems."

name: Marge Simpson
quotes: You're going to stay your current ages for the rest of your lives.
I’m so embarrassed I wish there was a hole I could just crawl into and die.

name: Bart Simpson
quotes: You're asking the wrong guy, Milhouse, you're asking the wrong guy.
“She's like a Milk Dud, Lis. Sweet on the outside, poison on the inside.”

name: Lisa Simpson
quotes: “Mom, romance is dead. It was acquired by Hallmark and Disney in a hostile takeover, homogenized, and sold off piece by piece.”
Why do I get the feeling that someday I'll be describing this to a psychiatrist?
